attributes.action: Impose harsher laws and punishments for child abuse ,neglect and SA
attributes.additional_details: Children are suffering left right and centre all over the UK and nothing is being done to tackle the issue quickly and appropriately, criminals are walking free with no punishment and victims are suffering , these are the most disgusting acts being allowed to happen in this country and one of the most toxic and biggest issues we face , I do not feel people can trust our justice system and it's time to stand up and say enough is enough, WE DEMAND CHANGE
attributes.background: Debate and discuss why these outrageous acts are happening at its highest rate and no action being took and criminals walking free to re-offend , it's time to change our children's futures

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Review minimum sentences for perpetrators of violence and sexual abuse
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/713293
